feature.label: Customer Relationships
feature.description:
Customer Relationships Project

This project uses a business process which interacts with an external (public) web service to manage customer information.

Because the web service is hosted on a remote server, you will need internet connectivity to run the example.

The complete example will create two additional projects besides the main project, these are:

customer-relationships-workitems

This project contains the Work Item Java handler code and can be built using Maven. The resulting jar file must be manually copied into the main project.

customer-relationships-test

This contains Java test classes that can be run as JUnit tests.
